thread.title: Education Department will experiment with aid eligibility for boot camps and MOOCs
thread.title_full: Education Department will experiment with aid eligibility for boot camps and MOOCs

title: Education Department will experiment with aid eligibility for boot camps and MOOCs
text:
14 Education Department will experiment with aid eligibility for boot camps and MOOCs 
Inside Higher Ed: The U.S. Department of Education today announced an experimental pathway to federal aid for partnerships between colleges and nontraditional providers, including ones that run skills boot camps or offer unaccredited online courses.As part of the long-awaited project, the department will waive a ban on colleges outsourcing more than half of their course content and instruction to a nonaccredited entity. The feds have that authority under the experimental-sites initiative, which allows for flexibility in testing the disbursement of financial aid.
